<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Giant Wolverine](/Monsters.aspx?ID=863)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Giant wolverines grow to the approximate size of horses and claim even more expansive territories than their more diminutive wolverine cousins. While a smaller wolverine will defend its prey from armed humanoids, a giant wolverine is unafraid to stalk and kill such creatures.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 19

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Giant Wolverine](/Monsters.aspx?ID=863)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 295 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +9; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [scent (imprecise) 30 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +3

**Con** +3

**Int** -4

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +13 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +9 

</row>

**HP** 65

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, climb 10 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +12,
**Damage** 2d6+8 piercing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 2d4+8 slashing

**Gnaw** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The wolverine has a creature grabbed from its jaws Strike; **Effect** The wolverine chews violently on the creature, dealing 2d6 piercing damage (DC 21 basic Fortitude save). A creature that fails its save also takes 2d6 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).

**Pounce** <actions string="Single Action" />  The giant wolverine Strides and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. If the giant wolverine begins this action [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22), it remains hidden until after the attack.

**[Rend](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=30)** <actions string="Single Action" />  claw

**Wolverine Rage** <actions string="Single Action" />  The giant wolverine enters a state of pure rage that lasts either for 1 minute, until there are no enemies it can perceive, or until it falls [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38), whichever comes first. While raging, the giant wolverine has AC 20, its jaws Strike deals 2d6+11 damage, and its claw Strike deals 2d4+11 damage. While raging, the giant wolverine can't use actions that have the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait, except for Seek. After it's stopped raging, a giant wolverine can't use Wolverine Rage again for 1 minute.

</column>
